headline.main: MISERY OF FRENCH IN CAMPS RELATED; Two Americans Tell of Plight of Prisoners at Luncheon for Christmas Aid CAPTURED OFFICER HEARD Miss Morgan Finds All Food Packages Delivered Safely and Efficiently

lead_paragraph: Two Americans who lived many years in France and a French Army officer who escaped from a German prison camp described yesterday the misery of more than 1,000,000 French war prisoners still behind barbed wire at a luncheon of Miss Anne Morgan's committee, which is raising a fund to send Christmas boxes containing food and tobacco to the prison camps in France and Germany.
abstract: A Morgan on food aid, s at N Y C French Relief Socs Coordinating Council
